title: ISic020480. ISic020480
body:
1(scil. λύχνος) κοινὸς το͂ [---]

1(scil. ΛΥΧΝΟΣ)ΚΟΙΝΟΣΤΟ[---]

Facsimile Images

Apparatus criticus

  • Text after Arena (IGASM 2)

English translation

Valentina Mignosa

(I am the lamp) shared between ...

Italian translation

Valentina Mignosa

(Sono la lucerna) condivisa tra ...

commentary

In this partly fragmentary inscription the sense of κοινά could be, as has been noted (cf. Dubois IGDS no.144d; Arena IGASM no.33), that of 'offering', of '(oil lamp) shared with' (cf. ISic020443) or it could correspond to the feminine Κοίνα of the uncommon anthroponym Κοινός (cf. LGPN V3A: 32169; V3B: 12961; V4: 30188-89-90-91-92).

bibliography

  • Arena 2002 33, pl. XIII.2 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001373
  • Dubois 1989 144d https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10000187
  • 29.0961 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10000796
Licensed under a Creative Commons-Attribution 4.0 licence.
